name: blast2bsml
description: convert raw blast output to BSML documents

options.description: The input raw blast output from the wu-blast suite.
The full path to the query FASTA file (used to populate refxref) [When used in workflow should be passed ITER_FILE_PATH]
Compress the bsml output. If there is not .gz extension on the the output file one will be added (optional).
Maximum number of HSPs stored per alignment (optional)
Maximum P-value at and above which to exclude HSPs (optional)
Whether to filter the HSPs by best Sum(P) when calculating the %id/coverage/similarity for the seq-pair-alignment
The ref/comp sequence type. Default is 'assembly'
Split the output into one file per query sequence even if the BLAST output represents multiple query sequences. Default is off.
Debug level. Use a large number to turn on verbose debugging.
